testsuite.name: Encryptor Tests

testcase.name: DecryptFromHex should throw exception for invalid hex
Encrypt should delegate to underlying encryptor
Decrypt should throw exception for invalid input
EncryptToHex should produce consistent output for same input
DecryptFromHex should decode hex before decrypting
Encrypt and decrypt should be reversible
Decrypt should delegate to underlying encryptor
EncryptToHex and decryptFromHex should be reversible
